title: By the Quene. The Quenes Maiestie perceiueth that not withstandyng her commaundment lately publyshed for the ceassyng of certaine vayne and vntrue reportes touchyng a decrye of moneyes ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: In Powles Church yarde, by Rycharde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,
notes: A proclamation against false reports of decrying money.
